name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xeedle - Get Relative, Index, Full XPath and Page Object File

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate testing with Xeedle Extension by obtaining the XPath of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate testing with ease! Xeedle is a revolutionary browser extension that simplifies finding XPaths on any webpage. Generate accurate and efficient XPaths with just a few clicks, saving your valuable time and effort.

Key Features:
1) Automatic XPath Generation: Get instant XPaths for any element on the current webpage.
2) Multi-language Support: Generate XPaths compatible with popular frameworks and programming languages (e.g., Java, Python, and JavaScript).
3) Easy Configuration: Select your automation framework and programming language for tailored XPaths.
4) Convenient Download: Download generated XPaths in a user-friendly format (e.g., .java, .py, and .js) for easy access.
5) User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive user interface for effortless XPath generation.

Here’s how it works:
1) Activate Xeedle: Click the extension icon in your Chrome or Firefox browser.
2) Set your environment: Select your automation framework and programming language from the dropdown menu.
3) Click and Generate: Click the “Generate XPaths” button.
4) Get your XPaths: Xeedle retrieves the current webpage’s DOM, processes it, and delivers a downloadable file containing all XPaths.
5) Download and Use: Access the generated XPaths directly for your automation scripts or testing needs.

Benefits of Xeedle:
1) Save Time & Effort: Eliminate the manual XPath creation, freeing up your valuable time.
2) Increased Accuracy: Reduce errors with automatic XPath generation.
3) Boost Productivity: Automate XPath generation for faster workflows.
4) Convenient Formats: Share and access XPaths easily with downloadable files.

Perfect for:
1) Web Testers: Automate tests faster and more efficiently.
2) QA Engineers: Improve testing quality and speed.
3) Front-End Developers: Effortlessly test web elements and interactions.
4) Anyone who needs XPaths: Get instant access to accurate XPaths with just a few clicks.

Download Xeedle today and experience the power of automated XPath generation!
